title: PasswordManager
description: A simple password manager app written in Python using the cryptography library for encryption and decryption.

title: MainstageApp
description: MainstageApp provides information about my rock band, offering fans a place to stay updated with our latest news. I developed it to learn Swift, a new language for me, and I plan to continue learning Swift, Apple's frameworks, and API integration.

title: ExchangeRateApp
description: A simple Python application that uses the ExchangeRate-API to fetch real-time exchange rates.

title: ForecastApp
description: This Python application uses the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch and display weather forecasts for a given city.

title: BooringAIO
description: Old CLI Nike Bot which is authenticated by the Hyper license manager. It was written to generate activity on Nike account to have better chances on raffles.
